alert.note: Alert for Clare; Lake; Mecosta; Newaygo; Osceola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:09AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Newaygo, western Clare, Osceola, southeastern Lake and northern Mecosta Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 508 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reed City, or 11 miles east of Baldwin, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Rapids... Evart... Baldwin... Reed City... Marion... Luther... Highland... Chase... Lake... Paris... Hersey... Le Roy... Tustin... Nirvana... Idlewild... Lake George... Ashton... Bristol... Avondale... Chippewa Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
